sprintGoal: Complete user profile management with avatar uploads, privacy settings, and account management

tasks.title: Implement user profile API endpoints
tasks.description: Create REST API endpoints for viewing and updating user profiles with all profile fields
acceptanceCriteria: GET /api/v1/users/me returns current user with profile
Profile fields: displayName, headline, bio, location, website, social links
Response includes stats: reputation, badges, contributions
Privacy settings respected for public profiles

tasks.title: Implement file upload service for avatars
tasks.description: Create file upload system with S3/CloudFlare R2 integration for user avatars and cover images
acceptanceCriteria: Image validation: JPEG, PNG, WebP only
Max file size: 5MB for avatars, 10MB for covers
Old images deleted on new upload

tasks.title: Implement skills management API
tasks.description: Create endpoints for adding, updating, and removing user skills with proficiency levels
acceptanceCriteria: Skill types: prompt_engineering, fine_tuning, rag, deployment, etc.

tasks.title: Implement work experience management API
tasks.description: Create CRUD endpoints for managing work experience entries on user profiles
acceptanceCriteria: Fields: title, company, location, employmentType, startDate, endDate, description

technicalNotes.validation: Zod schema for dates and required fields

tasks.title: Implement education management API
tasks.description: Create CRUD endpoints for managing education history on user profiles
acceptanceCriteria: Fields: institution, degree, fieldOfStudy, startDate, endDate, description

technicalNotes.sorting: ORDER BY display_order, end_date DESC NULLS FIRST

tasks.title: Implement portfolio projects management API
tasks.description: Create endpoints for managing portfolio projects with images and links
acceptanceCriteria: Fields: title, description, techStack, projectUrl, githubUrl, demoUrl
Image uploads for thumbnail and screenshots

technicalNotes.images: Use file upload service from SPRINT-1-002

tasks.title: Implement privacy settings API
tasks.description: Create endpoints for managing granular privacy controls per profile section
acceptanceCriteria: Settings per section: bio, work_experience, education, portfolio, skills, salary, contact
Visibility options: public, community, recruiters, private
Recruiters see more data than regular users

technicalNotes.logic: Filter profile data based on requesting user role
technicalNotes.defaults: All sections public except salary (recruiters only)

tasks.title: Implement account settings API
tasks.description: Create endpoints for changing email, password, and account deletion (GDPR)
acceptanceCriteria: Email change: sends verification to new email
Account deletion: soft delete with 30-day grace period
Deleted accounts: anonymize content, schedule hard delete

technicalNotes.emailChange: Create pending email change record, verify new email
technicalNotes.export: Generate JSON/ZIP with all user data

tasks.title: Implement session management API
tasks.description: Create endpoints for viewing and managing active user sessions
acceptanceCriteria: Session data: device, browser, IP, location, lastActive

technicalNotes.cleanup: Scheduled job to delete expired sessions

tasks.title: Build profile page UI
tasks.description: Create comprehensive user profile page showing all profile sections with edit capabilities
acceptanceCriteria: Sections: About, Skills, Experience, Education, Portfolio

technicalNotes.edit: Toggle between view and edit mode

tasks.title: Build profile edit forms
tasks.description: Create forms for editing all profile sections: basic info, skills, experience, education, portfolio
acceptanceCriteria: Edit profile modal with tabs for each section
Basic info form: displayName, headline, bio, location, website, socials
Skills form: add/edit/remove skills with proficiency slider
Portfolio form: add/edit/remove projects with image upload
Rich text editor for bio and descriptions (Tiptap)

technicalNotes.validation: Client-side validation mirrors backend Zod schemas

tasks.title: Build avatar and cover image upload UI
tasks.description: Create image upload components with crop, preview, and upload functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Avatar upload button with file picker
Aspect ratio enforcement (1:1 for avatar, 16:9 for cover)
Error handling (file too large, wrong format)

tasks.title: Build settings page UI
tasks.description: Create settings page for account management: email, password, privacy, sessions, deletion
acceptanceCriteria: Account tab: change email, change password
Privacy tab: visibility controls per section
Sessions tab: active sessions list with revoke buttons
Danger zone: delete account with confirmation
Password change: current + new password form
Session cards showing device, location, last active

technicalNotes.tabs: Account, Privacy, Security, Sessions, Danger Zone
technicalNotes.export: Trigger data export, show email notification

tasks.title: Build login and registration UI
tasks.description: Create login and registration modals/pages with email and OAuth options
acceptanceCriteria: OAuth buttons for Google, LinkedIn, GitHub
Success redirect to intended page or dashboard

technicalNotes.oauth: OAuth flow handled by popup or redirect
technicalNotes.storage: Store JWT in memory, refresh token in cookie
technicalNotes.redirect: Return to intended page after login

tasks.title: Build email verification and password reset UI
tasks.description: Create pages for email verification and password reset flows
acceptanceCriteria: Email verification: auto-verify on page load

technicalNotes.autoVerify: Call API on mount with token from URL
technicalNotes.redirect: Redirect to login after successful reset

tasks.title: Test user management features end-to-end
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of all user profile and account management features
acceptanceCriteria: Profile editing works for all sections
Responsive design works on all devices

technicalNotes.tools: Playwright for E2E, Lighthouse for performance

deliverables: Complete user profile system (view and edit)
GDPR-compliant account deletion and data export
Login and registration UI with OAuth
Email verification and password reset flows
